sign-in-method.legend: You can use a biometric residence permit (BRP) number or a unique application number (UAN) to sign in to this form.

brp.label: Biometric residence permit (BRP) number
brp.hint: This must match what is on your BRP card. For example, RZ1234567

uan.label: Unique application number (UAN)
uan.hint: Your UAN is on the Home Office invitation to complete this form. For example, 1111-2222-3333-4444

user-email.hint: We will email you a secure link, so you can save your information and return later.
